embed_description:
**Application Rules**

1. No Heavy IB/Remakes.
2. Strictly NOT Accepting Styles like; Rotos, Game Edits, Nep/Glitch.
3. No Arguing to the judges (please dont be immature).
4. Any Presets or Using Project files will result to receive a hard Decline.


The Judges will give you the following Results and the Founder will give you the official or final result of your edit below;

Accept - You passed the Standards of this unit, you are welcome to be our member.

Trial - You lack something, or they want to see more of your edits, you will be given a Trial Role in order to improve your edit.

Reapply - You have potential, but you have some things to improve or to be fix, You can ask the judges for some advice, You can apply again.

Decline - This means you have a lot of things to improve, in short, your edit didn't passed the standards in this unit, come back next time.

questions.question: Why do you want to join Sphinx?
